Name: arlington_2011_bike_facilities_pnt
LayerDisplayName: Bike Facilities points, Arlington County, VA 2008
Originator: GIS Mapping Center, Arlington County, VA
OriginatorSort: GIS Mapping Center, Arlington County, VA
Abstract: This dataset represents the facilities on or near bike trails (such as water fountains, bike repair shops) in Arlington County, VA 2008

    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the facilities on or near bike trails (such as water fountains, bike repair shops) in Arlington County, VA 2008</abstract>
      <purpose>This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a base map to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data. </purpose>
    </descript>
